SEARCH
Package polimi.ingsoft.server.controller

Class MatchController

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsoft.server.controller.MatchController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MatchController extends Object implements Serializable
The MatchController class manages the state and behavior of a single match.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • MatchController

      public MatchController(PrintStream logger, int matchId, int requestedNumPlayers, PublicBoard publicBoard, ChatController chatController)
      Constructs a MatchController with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      logger - the logger to be used for logging information
      matchId - the ID of this match
      requestedNumPlayers - the number of players requested for this match
      publicBoard - the public board for this match
      chatController - the chat controller for this match

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname) throws MatchAlreadyFullException
      Adds a player to this match.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to add
      Throws:
      MatchAlreadyFullException - if the match is already full

    • initializePlayers

      public void initializePlayers()
      Initializes the players for this match, using the information collected in PlayerInitialSetting. The initialization of the players can be done only once.

    • isFirstPlayer

      public Boolean isFirstPlayer(String nickname)
      Checks if a player is the first player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to check
      Returns:
      true if the player is the first player, false otherwise

    • setPlayerColor

      public void setPlayerColor(String playerNickname, PlayerColor color) throws WrongGamePhaseException, WrongStepException, InitalChoiceAlreadySetException, ColorAlreadyPickedException
      Sets the color for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player
      color - the color to set
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - if the game is not in the correct phase
      WrongStepException - if the game is not in the correct step
      InitalChoiceAlreadySetException - if the initial choice is already set
      ColorAlreadyPickedException - if the color is already picked by another player

    • setFaceInitialCard

      public void setFaceInitialCard(String playerNickname, Boolean isFaceUp) throws WrongGamePhaseException, WrongStepException, InitalChoiceAlreadySetException
      Sets the initial face-up card status for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player
      isFaceUp - the face-up status to set
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - if the game is not in the correct phase
      WrongStepException - if the game is not in the correct step
      InitalChoiceAlreadySetException - if the initial choice is already set

    • setQuestCard

      public void setQuestCard(String playerNickname, QuestCard questCard) throws WrongGamePhaseException, WrongStepException, InitalChoiceAlreadySetException
      Sets the quest card for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerNickname - the nickname of the player
      questCard - the quest card to set
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - if the game is not in the correct phase
      WrongStepException - if the game is not in the correct step
      InitalChoiceAlreadySetException - if the initial choice is already set

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(Player player, MixedCard card, Coordinates coordinates, boolean facingUp) throws WrongPlayerForCurrentTurnException, WrongStepException, WrongGamePhaseException, CoordinateNotValidException, NotEnoughResourcesException, MatchBlockedException
      Places a card on the board for a player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player placing the card
      card - the card to place
      coordinates - the coordinates to place the card
      facingUp - the facing-up status of the card
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerForCurrentTurnException - if it's not the player's turn
      WrongStepException - if the game is not in the correct step
      WrongGamePhaseException - if the game is not in the correct phase
      CoordinateNotValidException
      NotEnoughResourcesException
      MatchBlockedException

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(Player player, TYPE_HAND_CARD deckType, PlaceInPublicBoard.Slots slot) throws WrongPlayerForCurrentTurnException, WrongStepException, WrongGamePhaseException, MatchBlockedException
      Draws a card from the specified deck type for a player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player drawing the card
      deckType - the type of deck to draw from
      slot - the slot from which to draw the card
      Throws:
      WrongPlayerForCurrentTurnException - if it's not the player's turn
      WrongStepException - if the game is not in the correct step
      WrongGamePhaseException - if the game is not in the correct phase
      MatchBlockedException

    • writeBroadcastMessage

      public Message writeBroadcastMessage(String playerSender, String message) throws NotValidMessageException
      Adds a message in the broadcast chat.
      Parameters:
      playerSender - the nickname of the player sending the message
      message - the message to send
      Returns:
      the added message
      Throws:
      NotValidMessageException - if the message typed is not valid

    • writePrivateMessage

      public Message writePrivateMessage(String sender, String recipient, String message) throws PlayerNotFoundException, NotValidMessageException
      Adds a message in a private chat.
      Parameters:
      sender - the nickname of the player sending the message
      recipient - the nickname of the player receiving the message
      message - the message to send
      Returns:
      the added message
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if the receiver player has not been found
      NotValidMessageException - if the message typed is not valid
